41184.affected_area: Edmonton, Leduc, Nisku, Devon, Beaumont and surrounding communities
live_updates: The issues have been resolved and all services should be up and running.  Thank you for your patience.
Our technicians are beginning to restore services to your area. We thank you for your patience as each region is brought online. Everyone should back up as soon as possible!
On-site technicians continue working diligently to resolve this outage.
On-site technicians continue working diligently to resolve this outage.
Due to the complexity of this outage, our technicians are still working to resolve.

Technicians continue to work to restore service as quickly possible. However, due to the nature of the repairs involved, we expect that this will take several hours. We will continue to monitor the situation and provide updates when available.
Tech crews are on site working towards a resolution.
Technical crews are dispatched to arrive on site to investigate this matter.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
41184.summary: Customers in Edmonton, Leduc, Nisku, Devon, Beaumont and surrounding communities are experiencing an interruption to their Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
41184.title: Aug 29 – Edmonton, Leduc and surrounding communities | All Services - Outage (Resolved)

live_updates: Services in the area have been restored. Thank you for your patience.

41189.summary: Some customers in the Falconridge area of Calgary are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
